remarks: Conjunction distributes over exclusive-or, for decidable propositions. This is one way to interpret the distributive law of multiplication over addition in modulo 2 arithmetic.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 14-Jul-2018.)
statement: xordidc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( DECID ch -> ( ( ph /\ ( ps \/_ ch ) ) <-> ( ( ph /\ ps ) \/_ ( ph /\ ch ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
